statements: SELECT recipe_id, user_id, comment_text, rating FROM recipes_comments;
SELECT * FROM recipes_comments WHERE rate > 3;
SELECT recipe_id, user_id, rating FROM recipes_comments WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT comment_text, rating FROM recipes_comments ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM recipes_comments WHERE recipe_id = 5 AND user_id = 3;
SELECT recipe_id, user_id, comment_text, rating FROM recipes_comments WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY recipe_id DESC, rating ASC
SELECT user_id, comment_text, rating FROM recipes_comments WHERE recipe_id = 10 ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT recipe_id, rating FROM recipes_comments WHERE rating BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY rating DESC, recipe_id ASC
SELECT * FROM recipes_comments WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY recipe_id ASC
SELECT comment_text FROM recipes_comments WHERE recipe_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY recipe_id ASC
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, recipe_description FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, recipe_description FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_comments ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, comment_text, rating FROM user_comments WHERE recipe_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, recipe_description FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%chicken%';
SELECT recipe_name, COUNT(*) AS comments_count FROM recipes JOIN user_comments ON recipes.recipe_id = user_comments.recipe_id GROUP BY recipes.recipe_name;
SELECT recipe_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM recipes JOIN user_comments ON recipes.recipe_id = user_comments.recipe_id GROUP BY recipes.recipe_name HAVING avg_rating > 3.5;
SELECT user_id, comment_text, rating FROM user_comments WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY rating DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT recipe_name, recipe_description FROM recipe;
SELECT * FROM user_comments WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, rating FROM user_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT recipe_name FROM recipe WHERE recipe_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM user_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, recipe_description FROM recipe WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_comments WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY comment_id DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, user_id, rating FROM user_reviews JOIN recipe ON user_reviews.recipe_id = recipe.recipe_id WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT recipe_name, user_id, comment FROM recipe JOIN user_comments ON recipe.recipe_id = user_comments.recipe_id WHERE user_id = 200 ORDER BY comment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_reviews WHERE rating < 3 AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_comments WHERE recipe_id = 3);
SELECT * FROM recipes
SELECT recipe_name, recipe_description FROM recipes
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users
SELECT comment_text, comment_date FROM comments
SELECT review_rating, review_text, review_date FROM reviews
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, recipe_description FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT comment_text, comment_date FROM comments WHERE recipe_id = 2 ORDER BY comment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE review_rating > 3 ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT recipe_name, recipe_description FROM recipes
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT comment_text, comment_timestamp FROM comments ORDER BY comment_timestamp DESC
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT recipe_name, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM recipes JOIN reviews ON recipes.recipe_id = reviews.recipe_id GROUP BY recipe_name
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, recipe_description FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%Pasta%';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE recipe_id = 3 ORDER BY comment_timestamp DESC;
SELECT r.recipe_name, u.username, c.comment_text FROM recipes r JOIN users u ON r.recipe_id = u.user_id JOIN comments c ON r.recipe_id = c.recipe_id WHERE c.comment_id = 5;
